public Deadlines(String taskName, LocalDateTime deadline, boolean isComplete) {
return "[D]" + super.getStatusIcon(); // mark done task with X
Deadlines task = new Deadlines("Submit project", deadline);
assertEquals(deadline, task.deadline, "Deadline should be correctly set");
assertFalse(task.isComplete, "New Deadline task should be incomplete by default");
Deadlines task = new Deadlines("Submit project", deadline, true);
assertEquals(deadline, task.deadline, "Deadline should be correctly set");
assertTrue(task.isComplete, "Task should be marked as complete");
Deadlines task = new Deadlines("Submit project", deadline);
assertEquals("[D][ ] Submit project", task.getStatusIcon(), "Status icon should reflect an incomplete Deadline");
assertEquals("[D][X] Submit project", task.getStatusIcon(), "Status icon should reflect a completed Deadline");
Deadlines task = new Deadlines("Submit project", deadline);
assertEquals(expectedText, task.convertToText(), "Convert to text should match the expected format");
Deadlines task = new Deadlines("Submit project", deadline);
assertTrue(task.isComplete, "Task should be marked as done");
assertEquals("[D][X] Submit project", task.getStatusIcon(), "Status icon should reflect a completed Deadline");
assertFalse(task.isComplete, "Task should be marked as undone");
assertEquals("[D][ ] Submit project", task.getStatusIcon(), "Status icon should reflect an incomplete Deadline");
Deadlines task = new Deadlines("Complete assignment", deadline);
assertEquals(expectedString, task.toString(), "toString should return the proper string format");
assertEquals(expectedStringAfterDone, task.toString(), "toString should update after marking as done");
public Events(String taskName, LocalDateTime startTime, LocalDateTime endTime) {
public Events(String taskName, LocalDateTime startTime, LocalDateTime endTime, boolean isComplete) {
return "[E]" + super.getStatusIcon(); // mark done task with X
Events event = new Events("Team meeting", startTime, endTime);
assertEquals("Team meeting", event.taskName, "Task name should be correctly set");
assertEquals(startTime, event.startTime, "Start time should be correctly set");
assertEquals(endTime, event.endTime, "End time should be correctly set");
assertFalse(event.complete, "New Events task should be incomplete by default");
Events event = new Events("Project presentation", startTime, endTime, true);
assertEquals("Project presentation", event.taskName, "Task name should be correctly set");
assertEquals(startTime, event.startTime, "Start time should be correctly set");
assertEquals(endTime, event.endTime, "End time should be correctly set");
assertTrue(event.isComplete, "Task should be marked as complete");
Events event = new Events("Team meeting", startTime, endTime);
assertEquals("[E][ ] Team meeting", event.getStatusIcon(), "Status icon should reflect an incomplete event");
assertEquals("[E][X] Team meeting", event.getStatusIcon(), "Status icon should reflect a completed event");
Events event = new Events("Team meeting", startTime, endTime);
String expectedText = "E | 0 | Team meeting | 20 Feb 2025 | 20 Feb 2025";
assertEquals(expectedText, event.convertToText(), "Convert to text should match the expected format");
Events event = new Events("Team meeting", startTime, endTime);
assertTrue(event.isComplete, "Task should be marked as done");
assertEquals("[E][X] Team meeting", event.getStatusIcon(), "Status icon should reflect a completed event");
assertFalse(event.isComplete, "Task should be marked as undone");
assertEquals("[E][ ] Team meeting", event.getStatusIcon(), "Status icon should reflect an incomplete event");
Events event = new Events("Code review session", startTime, endTime);
String expectedString = "[E][ ] Code review session (from: 2025-02-20T10:00 to: 2025-02-20T12:00)";
assertEquals(expectedString, event.toString(), "toString should return the proper string format");
String expectedStringAfterDone = "[E][X] Code review session (from: 2025-02-20T10:00 to: 2025-02-20T12:00)";
assertEquals(expectedStringAfterDone, event.toString(), "toString should update after marking as done");
